app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps Pocket Pitch The Singer App
app_description: Pocket Pitch is a simple tool for singers who need to be able to quickly identify or play notes. This app combines a pitch pipe and piano so that you have two of the quintessential tools of a singer! The Pitch Pipe is its primary function. It uses professionally recorded sound so that the audio experience is just like carrying around a pitch pipe with you. The Keyboard allows for 6 octaves of pitches ideal for vocal warm ups or plunking out notes. The Info page allows the user to provide feedback directly to the developer. The goal is to make the best free mobile app for singers so input is greatly appreciated. A special thanks to the various contributors to Pocket Pitch: Md. Atikur Rahman Programming Greg Francis Audio Recording Tony Sherg Design Consultant
